mapper.sql: SELECT p.id AS id, p.org_user_id AS orgUserId, p.dict_code AS dictCode, p.happen_time AS happenTime, p.content AS content, p.place AS place, p.checks AS checks, p.check_people AS checkPeople, p.operation_state AS operationState, p.examine_state AS examineState, p.examine_people AS examinePeople, p.remarks AS remarks, u.name AS name FROM prizepunish AS p LEFT JOIN org_user AS u ON p.org_user_id = u.id
